aman_1_intro: ^Sat Sri Akaal! I am Aman Singh.
^As a Sikh, I keep my turban and beard, and wear the steel bangle, or kara.
^Those are usually the first things people notice about me. But there’s a lot more to me than that.
^I’ve recently completed my diploma in accountancy, and NS is just around the corner. That’s going to be ‘fun’...
^I’m also interested in media, and I’ve been told I’m good looking. I don’t mind exploring acting and modelling jobs.
^My parents and my older sister Prabhjot (we call her Jothi) have always been important in my life.
^They’ve been nicer to me than usual, lately. I think it’s because I’m about to enlist. And after NS, I plan to pursue an accountancy degree in Melbourne.
^They sometimes joke about losing the baby in the family. I think they genuinely feel a little sad.
^I’ll miss them, and my girlfriend Selinder. Sel and I met in poly, and people tease us because we're inseperable. It helps that she’s really, really, pretty.
^I should mention one more thing. One of my best friends is Zhihao -- we’ve lived in neighbouring HDB blocks since young, so we grew up together in a way.
^Zhihao’s great! But he can also be... a lot, sometimes. You’ll see.
^And this is what it’s like, to be me.
aman_1_1_narration: ^Zhi Hao and I are at a Sikh community event early on a Saturday morning.
aman_1_1: ^Oi! Focus la. You’re double-packing the fruits.
^You okay? You’ve been so quiet this morning. PMS ah?

c-0: ^ Stop it lah. I'm just nervous about enlistment. When are you going in?
^Why ah? Oh - because you posted army right?
c-1: ^ Anyway, thanks for doing this ya. I know volunteering is not the most exciting way to spend your weekend.
^It’s ok, good karma. Anyway, I know you’re enlisting soon, so can’t hang out already. Next month going in already right?
^You sound like you got handed death sentence. Why? Because going army right?
g-0: ^Ya. I thought I would get police. All my cousins got police. Dunno why I kena army. I heard BMT training is from morning to night. How to find time to wash my hair, dry my turban cloth...
^You keeping your turban? Die la. The cloth is never-ending. Can reach JB!

c-2: ^ You gotta stop those ‘jokes’ man. Just cos I’m your friend and I give you a free pass, all the time...
c-3: ^ Some of us have real problems on our hands you know.

g-1: ^I don’t get it though. If you’re worried about your turban, just cut hair lah.

s: ^So actually, I’ve been thinking about it

c-4: ^ That’s insane. And my parents would kill me!
c-5: ^ It would be easier to blend in. But, my parents would kill me...

g-2: ^You want to kena tekan by your parents, or kena tekan by the sergeant major?
^This is NS, sure tekan. Anyway, some of your cousins also don’t keep their turban what.
^Haha I remember your little cousin from the next block - remember we used to tease him in the playground?
^Oh my god, yes! We would hide his water bottle, and after playing police and thief, we would all be so thirsty drinking our water, and he would have none.
^Then when he asked us for a sip, we would say cannnnnnnnn...
^And hand him our empty water bottles! Once you filled his bottle with sand, remember?
^Eh it was your idea! We were damn mean sia.
^Anyway that kid cut hair since secondary school what. So no problem la.
^His parents are different. Anyway, focus la! We still have to deliver all of these bags to the rental block.
^Ok, but you go and think about it la. I really think you should just cut. Don’t make things harder for yourself.

aman_1_2: ^Oh my god, can you like, KNOCK?
^If you need privacy, lock the door. Anyway, what are you doing? Examining your forehead lines?
^Told you to do your yoga face exercises before bed. It will keep you youthful and glowing, like moi.
^Can I borrow your airpods? I sent mine for servicing.
^Ya, it’s in the second drawer. Take and get out.
^Don’t lie to me, what is this?
^Just take the airpods and go please, I have a lot of stuff to do --
^You’ve been cutting your hair, haven’t you?

c-0: ^ Yes, and I might cut it all off. So?
^Are you KIDDING me? Papa will kick you out.
c-1: ^You better not do anything stupid. Papa will kick you out.
g-0: ^Let him. I’m going to enlist anyway. I’ll just stay in camp.
^How could you even say that! Doesn’t this mean anything to you? How can you take this so lightly?

^Sis, until and unless you keep a turban yourself, or even keep your hair longer than your shoulders, or have to do bloody NS, for God’s sake, you are not in a position to comment on or judge my life choices.
^Don’t pretend to be so perfect. Neither of us are role models.
^Now, will you please take the airpods, and leave me alone?

aman_1_3_narration: ^One month later, Selinder and I are chatting.
aman_1_3: ^Babe, I’m sorry, I think I’m going to do it.
^Think of what this means for your faith and your identity. And your family.
^Hi babe. I’m so sorry about last night. I got so tired and I just passed out on my bed.
^I’m sorry if I came down too hard on you.
^I know this is your decision in the end.
^I mean, I know what I wish you would choose.
^But I will support you, no matter what.
^I wasn’t sure up till this very moment, but I’ve decided now.
^I am going to cut my hair. I have to do this.
^I'll keep my hair. You were right dear.
aman_1_4_narration: ^The next morning, while my family was still asleep....
aman_1_4: ^Don’t think. Just say it. Just say it.

c-0: ^Sorry. Sorry, I’ve changed my mind. Bye!
c-1: ^What style you want? Medium, or fade, or --
^I’m going NS tomorrow, so just cut very short.
^Some Singh customer ask to keep their hair. I can put in plastic bag for you.

aman_1_5_narration: ^This is the start of a new chapter in my life.
aman_1_5: ^Eh amma can we order something different for dinner tonight?
^It's Aman's last meal as a free man! We should get something nice tonight!
^He is going to NS, not to the moon. And anyway he likes my cooking.
^Speaking of whom, where is he? Went out for breakfast and hasn't come back yet!
^Aman - please tell amma you want to order something for dinner! Side with me!
^Let the boy make up his own mind Jothi! He's going to be a real man soon!
^Send them a selfie of your haircut

g-0: ^They've all seen it. Why don't the reply?
^I don’t care what they think. Do I care what they think?
^I'm going to NS so I had to cut it.

c-1: ^ Papa you don't understand what Army BMT is like!
^I had to cut it otherwise NS will be miserable for me - even more miserable than for the chinese boys.
^Nobody else in our family had to do Army BMT, and they all went to policy or SCDF so they didn't have to deal with this.
^If I didn't cut it, there's no time to wash my hair or turban in BMT!
c-2: ^This wasn't easy for me either but none of you even bothered to ask me about how I was preparing for Army BMT.
^All the chinese boys already complain about how hard it is and how little sleep they have.
^And they don't even have to wash their hair or turban every night.
^All the cousins went to police or SCDF so they have no idea how hard it is outfield.
^And you didn't care to ask me.
^You're just stuck in your old traditions and don't care about what's best for me.
c-3: ^I wanted to talk to you or Jothi about this but I knew you would judge me.
^Papa Army BMT is not like police or SCDF, so your experience and the cousins don't have to deal with mud and helmets.
^I didn't know what to do. I had nobody to talk to about this.
^I wish I didn't have to do this but Zhi Hao said they would tekan me in NS if I came in with a turban.
^I heard all these horror stories about how little sleep they get, and if I had to wash my hair and turban it would be even worse.
^Papa I'm sorry. I really had to do this.

g-1: ^Sigh. Son, come home. What's done is done. It is in Waheguru's hands now.

aman_1_6: ^Confirm you are Private Singh or not? Hello can answer?
^Er, sorry sergeant. I cut my hair yesterday. So I need a helmet.
^Hah? Your 11B photo you wear turban. You register say got turban. CMPB tell me you got turban.
^So I went to draw out turban for you.
^Wah lao eh! Now must procure helmet for you. Why you DAY ONE so troublesome?
^Take this first and go sit down. Later I call you.
^Arrrrrggggh Zhihao was right. First day after cutting my hair, I already kena tekan by my parents and by the sergeant.
^Hey, I overheard! You cut your hair?

c-0: ^ Why does everyone care so much about my hair?
^No, no. It's ok.. I guess I'm just on edge, man.
c-1: ^Yeah, I just cut yesterday. Thought it will be easier in army.
^Sure or not? Turban better right? No need wear helmet.

aman_1_7_narration: ^Two months later, in the Halal section of the cookhouse.
aman_1_7: ^Can’t believe we’re passing out soon. Three months flew by, don’t you think?
^Ya man, what an experience. We should be proud of ourselves.
^Signals man, ok la. I think quite slack. You?
^So good! Every day can book out!
^Not really. I wanted to join OCS to become an officer, or at least SISPEC la, become a sergeant.
^I thought I did really well in all my IPPT tests and training. But it’s still not enough, maybe.
^Did you speak to your sergeant? Tell him how you feel?
^Yes, I told him how badly I wanted to join and how others who did less well than me got into OCS.
^He said he knows I am a good soldier, but it’s beyond his control.

c-0: ^Aiya forget it la. Maybe it's because I’m Malay. So I can only be a driver or a storeman.
^To become a leader as a minority cannot just be good, must be exceptional.
g-0: ^You know, I cut my hair before I enlisted because I didn’t want to stand out as the only guy with a turban.
^It’s funny that some of us want to blend in with the others. And some of us want to stand out.
^You know what the stereotypes are. I want to break them.
^I’m not lazy, I’m not laidback! I’ve been the most garang in the platoon.
^And I will continue to be that.
^100 percent, bro. And I will always have your back.

aman_1_8_narration: ^My dad cried at the parade. He claims he didn't but I could see his eyes were wet when we hugged.
^Mum was just happy I survived, I think.
^Jothi made some snarky comments about by biceps being bigger than my brain now, but she seemed genuinely proud too.
^Sel came too. My parents finally met her. And liked her.
^Lukman saw her and gave me a big wink, then he brought his mum over to say hi.
^We took so many photos that my phone battery died.
^My family went out for dinner that night.
aman_1_8: ^Our Aman looked so handsome at his passing out parade!
^You did it, son. I am proud of you. Of course, you would have looked more handsome wearing a turban instead of a beret.
^Aman, turban or no turban, you will always be my hero.
^Aman beta, now that the hardest part is over, you should start thinking about what you will do after NS.
^I was thinking of trying my hand at theatre and short films, mum.

c-0: ^A few biceps and suddenly you think you can be an action hero eh?
^Haha, I think it's cool! Our next Diljit Dosanjh in the making!
^That’s nice beta, now is the time to explore your interests and see what you like before school starts again.
^But don’t forget to spend time with Selinder! She's quite a lovely girl.
c-1: ^You mean, “spend lots of time with Selinder”, right?
g-0: ^Ha, I must agree! I’m glad to have Aman back.
^If only I could freeze time here.

aman_1_9: ^PRIVATE SINGH! Ok, take this. Sit there with the rest.
^Hey, I’m Aman. Which section are you in?
^Nice! You can help me tie my turban.
^Haha just joking man. Anyway, I show you later!
aman_1_10: ^Help me can? I need to fold this turban to wear tomorrow.
^Cannn. Uh, how ah? Just fold it round and round?
^Ha, yes. Something like that. I have a neighbour who says it’s long enough to reach JB.
^And you’re uh... okay with him saying that?

c-0: ^Then why do you put up with it?
^I guess it’s just easier than making it a whole -- thing.
^He doesn’t mean any harm la, and he’s one of my oldest friends.
^He’s just always said crap like that because I guess I never told him I don't like it, and it would be kind of awkward to get mad about it now.
^Sounds like you’re making excuses for him, bro...
c-1: ^Yeah, I guess. I mean he says a lot of insensitive crap, but I’m just used to it by now.
^Anyway he's an old friend. He doesn't mean any harm, and he's a good guy deep down.
^You shouldn’t have to get used to it. You should tell him it’s insensitive.
^I think I have la. It’s in one ear and out the other.
^Sounds like you should shout louder, eh?
g-0: ^Just follow me. You fold into half first... yes, correct.
^Now, hold tightly and I will fold towards you… Ok, done!
^Wah steady. I fold my first turban. Ok! Now what bro?
^All good. I will tie by myself now.
^Sure ah? Ok, I’m going to say prayers - maghrib now. See you at dinner.

aman_1_11_narration: ^Later that night, right after I wash my hair.
aman_1_11: ^Ah Man, don’t wash your hair at night leh. We all cannot sleep seeing your long hair in the dark. So scary!

c-1: ^They want scary? I'll give them scary.

aman_1_12: ^You’ve been scratching your head all day. Must be very hot inside ah?
^Very, bro. Super itchy and uncomfortable. All the heat and sweat trapped inside. I feel like my head is a furnace.
^No, just sticks to the scalp and becomes more grimy. Gross!
^Just two more days. Endure. Then you can wash all you want.
^Can use my herbal essence shampoo and be like shampoo ad. Hair can fling back and forth.
^Ha! Oh my god. Can’t wait. The others are gonna be like eeyer so dirty!
^Screw them. Let them say what they want. They don’t matter.
^You really are my buddy. I am so lucky to have you.
^Anyway, I can’t believe we’re passing out soon. Three months just flew by.
^Ya man, what an experience. We should be proud of ourselves.
^Signals man, ok la. I think quite slack. You?
^So good! Every day can book out!
^Not really. I wanted to join OCS to become an officer, or at least SISPEC la, become a sergeant.
^I thought I did really well in all my IPPT tests and training. But it’s still not enough, maybe.
^Did you speak to your sergeant? Tell him how you feel?
^Yes, I told him how badly I wanted to join and how others who did less well than me got into OCS.
^He said he knows I am a good soldier, but it’s beyond his control.

c-0: ^Aiya forget it la. Maybe it's because I’m Malay. So I can only be a driver or a storeman.
^To become a leader as a minority cannot just be good, must be exceptional.
g-0: ^You know, I cut my hair before I enlisted because I didn’t want to stand out as the only guy with a turban.
^It’s funny that some of us want to blend in with the others. And some of us want to stand out.
^You know what the stereotypes are. I want to break them.
^I’m not lazy, I’m not laidback! I’ve been the most garang in the platoon.
^And I will continue to be that.
^100 percent, bro. And I will always have your back.

aman_1_13_narration: ^My dad cried at the parade. He claims he didn't but I could see his eyes were wet when we hugged.
^Mum was just happy I survived, I think.
^Jothi made some snarky comments about by biceps being bigger than my brain now, but she seemed genuinely proud too.
^Sel came too. My parents finally met her. And liked her.
^Lukman saw her and gave me a big wink, then he brought his mum over to say hi.
^We took so many photos that my phone battery died.
^My family went out for dinner that night.
aman_1_13: ^Our Aman looked so handsome at his passing out parade!
^You did it, son. I am proud of you.
^Aman, you will always be my hero.
^Aman beta, now that the hardest part is over, you should start thinking about what you will do after NS.
^I was thinking of trying my hand at theatre and short films, mum.

c-0: ^A few biceps and suddenly you think you can be an action hero eh?
^Haha, I think it's cool! Our next Diljit Dosanjh in the making!
^That’s nice beta, now is the time to explore your interests and see what you like before school starts again.
^But don’t forget to spend time with Selinder! She's quite a lovely girl.
c-1: ^You mean, “spend lots of time with Selinder”, right?
g-0: ^Ha, I must agree! I’m glad to have Aman back.
^If only I could freeze time here.

aman_2_intro: ^I am finally done with NS, what an adventure!
^So many varied experiences, and I have made some good friends too, like Lukman.
^I got accepted into my first choice uni in Melbourne!
^I’ve got a couple of months off before I fly off.
^In the meantime, can't wait to binge on Netflix, spend quality time with Sel and start exploring some acting and modelling gigs.
^Maybe I’ll be famous by the time I leave for Oz...

aman_2_1_ending1: ^Hey, that picture of Selinder and me actually looks pretty good on the wall.
^Maybe Papa wasn’t entirely wrong about growing out my hair again.
^I only did it to keep the peace, but it’s not a bad look.
aman_2_1_ending2: ^I wonder if Selinder has left her house yet, for our date tonight.
^I'm glad I didn't cut my hair - the turban looks pretty good and she likes the look!
^I’ve been loving our time together since I got out of NS, but I wonder...
^Will we last when I move to Australia?

aman_2_1a: ^Hey yourself! What are you up to?
^Hm same old. Surfing socials for casting calls.
^Ha, that’s what I like to hear.
^Will you be thinking of me as much when you’re in Australia?

c-0: ^Absence makes the heart grow fonder, you know that right?
^I am so happy to hear you say that.
^I know long distance is tough, but I’m committed to you babe.
c-1: ^I want to give you the perfect answer, but the truth is that there are so many unknowns.
^I’ve never been in a long distance relationship before. :(
^But I really care about you, and I feel like we are closer every day.
^That is not what I would have liked to hear, but I appreciate that you are always honest with me.
^To be honest, I have been thinking and worrying along the same lines too.
^But we can deal with things one step at a time. Right?
g-0: ^Okay I’m leaving my place now, see you soon <3

aman_2_1b: ^Singapore Casting Calls Group eh? Let's see if there's any roles for me.
^It must be so cool to do this full time.
^Maybe I’ll get discovered. Get rich. Be famous.
^Riding along, with hot girls, in my red convertible along Palm Springs California, the wind in our hair...
^I’ve applied to dozens of casting calls in the past month, but nobody replies.
aman_2_1c: ^Hi, this is Elsa from Everyday Productions! We got your email.
^Can you send me your unedited full body pic, close up shot and side shots pls. And also your per day rate.
^Hi Elsa, thanks for getting back to me! Please see my photos attached.
^Wait, she asked for my rates. What are my rates? Oh good grief. Uh...

c-1: ^Thanks Aman. Will get back to you.
g-0: ^Waheguru, Waheguru, Waheguru, please help me get the part!
^ok, better get ready for date night!

c-0: ^Not much luck yet. I’ve been applying, but nobody responds.
^Sometimes I check the email addresses again and again to make sure I didn’t make a mistake, and the email went through.
^Oh - I got an agent query today though!
^She asked for my pics and rates. Look, these are the pics I sent her.
^You used the ones I took of you at Chloe's party!
^You look very handsome in them. Let me know when she responds, okay?
^Of course! Maybe if I get a foothold in entertainment now, I can continue when I move to Australia.
c-1: ^Oh, it’s all good. I’m taking it easy, just trying my luck.
^I’m not taking this seriously or anything.
^I can’t look like an idiot in front of her...
^You’re not? I thought you’ve always been into acting, and the arts.
^Oh sure, but it’s just a hobby, you know.
^Just killing time until I move to Australia.
g-0: ^If not, I’d take you with me!
^You’d better! If not, I’ll cut you up into tiny pieces and make mutton keema (mince) out of you.

aman_2_3: ^Speaking of dramatic... I haven’t heard from Elsa.
^Or anyone else. Maybe I should text her? Where did I put my phone...
^Where are you going! You’re missing the best part!
^Mukesh is going to confront Tina’s father!
^Just going to grab my phone, ma.
^Whole day tik tik tik on the phone. Don’t know what side business you have going on.
^Sigh, still no reply from that casting agent Elsa.
^Do I sound desperate? Maybe I'll try a different tactic...
aman_2_3_whatsapp1: ^Hi Elsa, this is Aman! Just checking to see if you have any update on the role?

c-0: ^I’m planning my schedule for the next few weeks, and it’s looking packed!
c-1: ^I loved the creative brief you posted, so I’m really hoping I’m a fit for the role.
g-0: ^Thanks again for reaching out to me!
^Nothing to do now but wait, I guess…
^A new message! Maybe it's Elsa! Please let it be good news!

aman_2_3_whatsapp2: ^Bro up for drinks next weekend? I’ll make the booking.
^Drinks? He knows I’m not supposed to drink, right?
^Well, I can always order something non-alcoholic.
^Aman, hurry! Tina is threatening to burn herself alive!
^Another message. Uh what does Zhihao want now?
aman_2_3_whatsapp3: ^Hi Aman. Client decided to go with another talent. Thanks.
^Thanks Elsa, no worries. Can I just check if client gave any reason for not proceeding?

b: ^ Oh, hmm frankly the rate you quoted is quite high for someone with no experience... but...
^ Your rates were actually surprisingly low... but...

aman_2_3_whatsapp3: ^Look-wise, they prefer someone with more clean look.
^No offence yup. Just that more relatable without turban and long beard.

c-1: ^ Hope you’ll keep me in mind if other roles come up!

aman_2_3_home: ^They prefer someone with a more clean look.
^Why is everything in my life such a challenge?
^Everything in my life is so much harder with a turban. Why??
^Sorry, I’m really tired. I’m going to bed.
aman_2_4: ^Hi jaan (dear), how are you? What are you doing?
^Just turning in for the night. How about you?
^Weird, I told Zhihao the same thing just now, but he didn’t seem touched.

aman_2_4_bad_day: ^You know, I’m glad you called. It was a rotten day. Got rejected from a casting call.
^And the thing is, when I asked her why I didn’t get the part?
^She said it’s because they wanted someone with a ‘clean look’. No turban, no beard.
^What do you mean it's to be expected?
^Tsk. I mean, you know la. For us, it’s harder.
^Turban and all. Not that many roles.
^Is that how you’ve felt all along? Like I’ve been on a wild goose chase?
^No jaan (dear), that’s not what I meant.
^Just... that you need to manage your expectations. You can’t be so idealistic.
^So I should give up on my dreams, become a boring accountant, and live a boring average Joe life.
^Oh wait! I’m not even an average Joe. So below-average Joe life.
aman_2_4_confide: ^When you told me you were waiting to hear back from an agent, this is the reply I expected you to get all along!
aman_2_4_not_confide: ^You told me you were just killing time, and now you’re acting like this is the biggest deal!
^Okay. Yup. I am silly. My dreams are silly. Everything I do is silly.
^Go and find someone who is not silly then.
aman_2_4_sleep: ^Babe, thanks for calling, but I think I’ll call it a night.
^Aman, you’d tell me if anything was bothering you, right?
^Lately, you’ve felt a little distant. Ever since NS?
^Why do I want things I can’t have?
^Why do I want to be someone I’m not?
^Why can’t I be happy, being me?
^I wish I could be like Selinder, at peace with herself.
^Some kind of role model, for somebody.

aman_2_5_narration: ^The dreams kept repeating. Taunting me. Rejecting me.
^Every night, it was the same dream. I pick up my phone, and there's a message.
^Actually you have nice features, but can’t really see them.
^Sorry. you are not what anybody is looking for in a model.
^Sorry, nobody wants to be you, Aman.
^I wish the dreams would stop. Maybe I just need one gig.
aman_2_5: ^This sucks. Only three more months before I leave for Melbourne, and I haven’t scored a single gig. Not even as an extra!
^Maybe - maybe if I changed my look? Slick my hair back, and wear it in a ponytail instead...

b: ^ I cut my hair for NS, and it didn't make life easier. I won't change my look again.
^ I didn't even cut my hair to make life easy for NS - I'm not going to change my look now.

c-1: ^I remember what Ma used to say, when I got bullied in school.
^Sikhs are courageous, and face their challenges head on. Never giving up. Always remaining in chardikala (optimism).
^I won’t give up. I’ll keep trying, just as I am.

aman_2_6_narration: ^Playing Playstation with Zhihao is like meditation. Clears my mind.
^Oh, another message! From Claire, the other casting agent!
^I guess she liked the photos I sent!
aman_2_6: ^Hey Aman, thanks for sending over those photos! Can you come down for an audition tomorrow?
^Wow, this new look actually works. How should I style myself for this audition...?
^Bro - can I borrow your Adidas cap tomorrow?
^Har? Why you need my cap? You already have your own in-built cap what.
^Oi stop being such an asshole. Just borrow me can. I got audition tomorrow.
^Wearing a cap instead of a turban.
^They ask you take out your turban?
^Not they ask. But it’s hard to get roles with a turban.
^So I’ve been sending out my pics with my hair tied back.

aman_2_6_cut_hair: ^Wah lau eh. Funny la you. That time before NS, you cut your hair, then you decide to keep long again.
^Now doing all this disguise to pretend like short again.
aman_2_6_keep_hair: ^Fake la you. That time ask you cut once and for all don’t want to cut.
^Now doing all this hidden disguise pretend like short hair. Funny sia you.
aman_2_6_cap: ^Eh, you gonna borrow me your cap, or you gonna give me a lecture?

c-1: ^One more thing. Don’t tell Selinder, okay?
^I tell Selinder for what? Your girlfriend not my girlfriend.
^Just don’t make your girlfriend problem my problem.
^Okay just don’t say anything, then no problem.
g-0: ^Oi, can we finish the game or not. talk so much until i missed the goal.
^This is a great opportunity, right? I should be excited.
^Why do I feel so uneasy? Like I’m a fraud?
^Am I so desperate to be on TV, I’ll do anything...?

aman_2_7_narration: ^A few weeks later, in the supermarket with mum.
aman_2_7: ^Ma, enough la. Who’s gonna carry so many plastic bags?
^I didn’t send you to the jungle for two years so you could complain about carrying my plastic bags.
aman_2_7_whatsapp1: ^Hi Aman, thanks for coming by last week for the audition.
^Discussed with the client, and he really likes your facial features.
^Would you be open to cutting your hair? We are looking for a more clean-cut look. And no facial hair.
^The client is keen on your looks, aside from that.
^No, I can’t cut. It’s ok, thank you.
^What are you looking so down in the dumps about, beta (son) ?
^Oh...I got one new message. Probably another rejection from another casting agent.
aman_2_7_whatsapp2: ^Hey, Aman! Kristine from TOP. We got your email and pics. Thanks for your interest in "A Trip in Time".
^That’s the World War II drama that needs British Indian soldiers! Will this be my lucky break?
^Can you come down for an audition next Tuesday at 10am?

c-0: ^Great! And just to check, if the audition goes smoothly, what’s your schedule like for the next few months?
^The next three months are clear for me, until I start school.
c-1: ^Checking in advance, if the audition goes smoothly, what’s your schedule like for the next few months?
^I’m all good for the next 3 months until I start school. If I’m selected I’ll definitely make this my number one priority
g-0: ^Oh and one more thing, we need our character to have a turban and a full beard.
^You’re okay not to cut your hair or trim your beard for a while, right?

aman_2_7_cut_hair: ^What happened? Smiling so much. Must be a message from Selinder?
^Even better! I’ll tell you later, Ma.
aman_2_7_keep_hair: ^What happened? Smiling so much. Must be a message from Selinder?
^Even better! I’ll tell you later, Ma.

aman_2_8: ^Definitely this red dress, right? Come on, Aman. Validate my choices.

c-0: ^No way. It has to be the black one.
c-1: ^You’re so hilarious, I don’t know why you haven’t been cast for a comedy.
g-0: ^You and Dev broke up, so why does it matter what you wear at tonight’s party?
^Hello, are we related, how can you be this dense?
^I need to sear those eyeballs into the back of his brain, like fishballs melting into a barbeque pit.
^Anyway, back to what I was saying.
^I feel Natasha is doing the whole Eat Pray Love thing right now with her trip to Cambodia.
^I mean seriously, who goes to find themself in CAMBODIA. All you’ll find is landmines --
^Okay fine, I mean like, it’s dusty and all.
^I mean, wouldn’t Venice be more charming? Getting lost in the bylanes. Saved by a tall, dark and handsome...
^Gawd, you’re such a killjoy. Anyway, I’m going with this

aman_2_8_whatsapp1: ^You’ve been selected to play Sundar Singh in A Trip in Time.
^We will be emailing you details of the script and call sheet soon.
^In the meantime, please block 15 days of your calendar for next month.
^I GOT THE PART! Shooting starts next month! I’m SO HAPPY!
^My baby bro! I’m so happy for you - well done! And I’m the first to know. So honoured.
^Who are you going to tell next?!
^I will tell papa and ma first!

c-0: ^Selinder, of course. My number one girl.
c-1: ^Papa and Ma, so don’t say anything yet! I’ll tell them at dinner.
g-0: ^Thank you God, for helping me get this part.

b: ^I am so glad I didn’t have to change anything about myself.
^This just reinforces that I can just be me and still succeed in life.

aman_3_intro: ^After months of sending out a million (ok fine, maybe fifty) applications.
^I am super stoked to be acting in a period drama, playing a WWII soldier!
^And the timing couldn't be better, by the time I'm done with the project I zip off to Oz.
^For now, it's party time with my favourite peeps!
aman_3_1_narration: ^Selinder, Lukman (and his girlfriend Sammy, who is Chinese), and Zhihao are all having dessert with me at Resipi Alegri (a new cafe in our area) to celebrate.
aman_3_1: ^Man, I’m still so full after dinner.
^The menu here looks good, but I don’t think I have room for dessert.
^It’s just nice to be chilling with you guys.
^And Lukman, thanks for coming along for ‘Round 2’ even though this place is not Halal.
^Er... Special occasion la, make exception for you.
^As long as I just stick to coffee, I’m okay.
^Anyway, our dinner just now was good, so I’m super full -- no need to eat anymore.
^Hi everybody, my name is Ravi and I'll be your waiter.
^Wahlao, why no one drinking? Can’t be just me right?
^Selinder and Lukman very holy I can understand, but Sammy surely can join me for drink??
^Just because you date Lukman doesn't mean you must become boring and holy la.
^Otherwise I'm drinking all alone tonight, macam like alcoholic! haha.

c-0: ^Let her order what she wants la. She order hers, you order yours.
c-1: ^Eh, you’re like mister racial harmony today ah.
^No, moment over, it would just be awkward...
g-0: ^Okay, okay. But Aman, you MUST have a drink with me.
^It’s your night man! This is all to celebrate your acting debut!
^Oh, no la bro. Actually not supposed to.
^But I’ve seen you drink before leh.
^Don’t look at Sel, don’t look at Sel...
^Just one la bro. So you don't forget me when you're famous!
^Wah lau, last whole month I rush down to studio so many times when you forgot your script la your boots la whatever.. you owe me one man!

c-2: ^Selinder doesn’t seem to be calling me out...
^I know she doesn’t approve, but I guess she’s letting me make my own choices.
^She’s such a cool girl. And she looks beautiful tonight, as always.
c-3: ^Nah, I’m really not supposed to. I’ll have an apple juice, please.
^Wahlao. Ok excuse me, can you make it two Coronas. I will drink more on his behalf.

g-1: ^Everyone, shall we raise our glasses and celebrate Aman’s big win?
^Aman, I must say, I’m actually very happy for you. Applied so many times. Finally got something!
^Na, come and punch la. You do the honours.

aman_3_1_whatsapp: ^I'm celebrating with my friends! What happened?
^You’re in trouble is what happened. Come home and we talk.
^Ok, I’ll walk Selinder home and head back.
^No, come home NOW. Papa is angry.
^Guys, sorry, I need to leave. Something urgent came up at home.
^Whaaaat? I was looking forward to the sugee cake. Heard it’s super good.
^Yes, don’t worry babe, you stay here and enjoy.
^It’s probably something minor, I’ll update you later.
^Take care bro. Anything let us know. I call you later to check in can?
aman_3_2_narration: ^I walked into my house and everybody was sitting there, waiting for me.
^Pa had his arms folded, and glaring daggers at me.
^Mama looked anxious. Jothi looked a bit smug.
^It looked like the scene from one of my mum's movies.
aman_3_2: ^What’s this? Now I know where I got my drama bug from.
^I already told you all, out with Selinder and friends.

aman_3_2_drink: ^Laughing and making so much noise, like drunkards.
^If not, how did I manage to drive home?
^Only two of us were drinking, and just one drink each! What’s the big deal!
^The big deal is that Sikhs don’t drink, Aman.
^Outside, you never know who is watching and will spread gossip. We must be careful.
^People can spot your turban from a mile away.
^You have to be responsible, and a good example for others. Always.
aman_3_2_no_drink: ^Laughing and making so much noise, like drunkards.
^Oh my god we were not drunk!
^Only Zhihao was drinking, and he was on his first beer!
^I was drinking JUICE! So what’s the big deal!
^Oh! Well I’m glad you weren’t drinking, Aman.
^But still, you must be careful about appearances, and the company you keep.
^You never know who is watching. People can spot your turban from a mile away.
^You have to be a good example.
aman_3_2_scene: ^You know how strict Selinder’s parents are.
^If they hear that you brought their daughter drinking, what will they think of you?
^Of us? That we are a bad influence on their daughter?
^Papa, you make it sound like we were smoking or taking drugs.
^What about those uncles who drink at the coffee shop in the afternoon?
^And this Uncle Ranjit, it’s not like he is so perfect right?
^We cannot look at bad examples to justify bad behaviour.
^Drinking is not the Sikh way. Period.
aman_3_2_fight: ^If I am chilling with my friends, celebrating a small victory of my own, how is it a mistake! Explain to me!
^Nowadays, you’ve learnt to talk back eh? One acting job and you think you’re some big shot?
^No dad, I just know what you all want from me. When you asked me to keep my turban, I listened --

b: ^Only AFTER you cut your hair in the first place!
^Of COURSE you should keep your turban, you are Sikh!

aman_3_2_fight: ^I didn’t even ASK to keep a turban! It was put on me since young!
^Why are they cornering me like this?
^This was supposed to be a happy night for me!
^Is that really how you feel, beta (son) ?
^It’s just a lot of pressure, Ma. To be this good role model.
^To always make sure I’m on my best behaviour.
^In fact, why is all this pressure on me?
^How come Prabjhot over here doesn’t face the same issues?
^Ok, I won't drag you into this

c-0: ^It’s true, right? You stay out late, go drinking with your friends, cut your hair, dye your hair, wear short clothes --
c-1: ^Alright, fine, I won’t drag Jothi into it, but --
^Noooo, please, by ALL means, PRABHJOT would like you to continue.
^I’m just saying, you get to stay out late, go drinking with your friends, wear short clothes
g-0: ^You all are just biased towards her!
^All the pressure is on me just because I keep a turban.
^All that matters to you is what people think, what people will say --
^We are saying this for your own good, beta (son)  --
^It would be really GOOD if you just let me live my life!
^I can’t breathe. I’ve got to get out of here.

aman_3_2_apologise: ^Maybe it’s true. I should have asked to go someplace without alcohol.
^I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to cause any problem or embarrassment.
^Just be more careful, beta (son) . We love you.
^I’m a little tired, I’ll go rest in my room.
